game.name: Backrooms Lost Dimension
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 코멘터리 제공, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Backrooms: Lost Dimension is a single-player horror adventure. Explore unsettling levels, solve unique puzzles, and survive terrifying encounters while following an original story. Free content updates with new levels will expand the experience and keep the nightmare evolving.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Backrooms: Lost Dimension is a single-player horror adventure. Explore unsettling levels, solve unique puzzles, and survive terrifying encounters while following an original story. Free content updates with new levels will expand the experience and keep the nightmare evolving.
